title: Bluetooth Distance Scanner
description: Scan nearby Bluetooth devices and estimate their distance based on signal strength. Features include real-time RSSI-based distance estimation, device discovery, and a user-friendly interface. Perfect for locating devices or monitoring proximity.

title: Wi-Fi Signal Meter
description: Monitor Wi-Fi signal strength with dynamic visual feedback. Features include real-time signal strength display, color-coded bars for clarity, and connectivity monitoring. Perfect for optimizing your network setup or checking signal quality.

title: Light Level Meter
description: Measure real-time light levels in your environment. Features include maximum and average lux tracking, elapsed time display, and a visual light level bar. Ideal for photography, indoor lighting, or ambient monitoring.

title: Noise Level Meter
description: Measure real-time noise levels with a dynamic and sleek interface. Features include maximum and average noise tracking, elapsed time display, and a visual sound level bar in vibrant colors. Perfect for environmental monitoring, personal use, or fun noise detection.
